alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 24 at 8:52PM EST until December 25 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Garrett County, Extreme Western Allegany County, and Western Mineral County. * WHEN...Until noon EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
